Package io.github.izdwuut.yarl.views

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.views.GameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.ashley.signals.Listener<Event>

    public class GameScreen
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
implements com.badlogic.ashley.signals.Listener<Event>
    A main screen - the game screen. It displays a dungeon and message log. It listens to a MovementSystem in order to update display based on player input.
    Since:
    2017-11-18
    Author:
    Bartosz "izdwuut" Konikiewicz

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameScreen

        public GameScreen​(World world,
                  Settings settings,
                  Creature player)
        Constructs a game screen using provided parameters. Sets a Viewport, adds actors to a Stage and calls for putMap to put a dungeon on a SparseLayers.
        Parameters:
        world - a World entity
        settings - Settings entity
        player - a player Creature
